content.query:
CREATE TABLE Addresses
  (  
    SourceID	Integer,
    UniqueID	varchar(64),
    AddressID	varchar(64),
    CustomerID	varchar(64),
    AddressLine1	varchar(64),
    AddressLine2	varchar(64),
    City	varchar(64),
    State	varchar(64),
    ZipCode	varchar(64),
    CreatedDate	Date,
    UpdatedDate	Date
  )
WITH (DISTRIBUTION = REPLICATE, CLUSTERED INDEX (AddressID));
